business.headline: India, US may agree on interim trade deal by June 25: SourcesAn interim trade pact between India and the US may be agreed upon by June 25, according to sources. A team of US officials is expected to visit India next month for trade talks.

Filing ITR late? You can earn 33% more interest on tax refunds this yearIf you've paid extra tax via TDS, advance tax, or self-assessment, you're entitled to a refund. As per Section 244A of the Income Tax Act, the department pays 0.5% monthly interest on the excess.
Want to get debt-free sooner? 5 simple ways to pay off your loan fasterPersonal loans help manage big expenses, but repaying them quickly saves on interest and boosts your credit score.

MSP boost for farmers as Cabinet clears new rates for Kharif season 2025-26The MSP is the minimum price at which the government promises to buy crops from farmers, even if the market prices are lower. It is set every year for various crops to make sure farmers get a fair price.

Sensex ends 240 points lower, Nifty below 24,800; ITC falls 3%The BSE Sensex ended 239.31 points lower at 81,312.32, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 73.75 points to settle at 24,752.45. Most of the broader market indices also fell due to high volatility.

Zerodha's Nithin Kamath explains why India's GDP growth isn't enoughNithin Kamath mentioned that both the government and private companies need to work together to improve education, research, and regulations. Otherwise, many talented Indians may choose to work abroad, and India will miss out on its chance to grow faster.

ITR deadline extension: Why it happened and what you need to do nowEven though the deadline to file your ITR has been extended to September 15, 2025, it's still wise to get started early. Waiting till the last minute often leads to unnecessary stress and errors.

Why the world's ultra-rich are looking for a Monaco addressMore and more of the world's richest people are looking to move to Monaco or at least have an address there. But why is this tiny country, smaller than many cities, drawing so much interest from the ultra-rich?

Finfluencer frenzy: Why you shouldn't chase viral stock tipsCan you spot when a finfluencer's tip will make you money or cost you everything? How much are you really risking chasing the next viral stock? Read on to find out.

Soon, every Indian address may get a unique Digital IDThe Centre wants to bring addresses under India's Digital Public Infrastructure (DPI) matrix. Right now, there is no proper system or rule to manage address details in the country.

Belrise Industries share price: Stock lists below expectations with 11% premiumBelrise Industries listing: The company's shares listed at Rs 100 on the BSE, which is an 11.11% rise over the issue price of Rs 90. On the NSE, the stock started trading at Rs 98.50, which is a gain of 9.44%.

Centre proposes bill for online property registration. What it means for you?The Centre has floated a draft bill to digitise property registration. If passed, it could change how you buy, sell, or prove ownership of real estate.

entertainment.headline: Did Vijay Deverakonda click Rashmika Mandanna's saree pics? Fans think soActor Rashmika Mandanna shared saree pictures on Instagram, sparking fan speculation. Many believe Vijay Deverakonda is the photographer.

Anushka Sharma, Virat Kohli's celebratory pic after RCB's win against LSGAnushka Sharma and Virat Kohli celebrated RCB's win against LSG on May 28. A picture of the couple after the match has gone viral.

Bhojpuri star Nirahua, Kusha Kapila join Ravi Kishan in Maamla Legal Hai 2Ravi Kishan is set to reprise his role as VD Tyagi in Netflix's Maamla Legal Hai Season 2. The new season brings fresh faces and promises more legal mischief and laughter in the Patparganj court.

Stolen trailer: Abhishek Banerjee's relentless hunt for a missing baby'Stolen' is a gripping thriller about two brothers on a desperate search for a kidnapped baby. Starring Abhishek Banerjee and Mia Maelzer, the film premieres globally on June 4, 2025.

Hrithik Roshan collaborates with Hombale Films for pan-India projectHrithik Roshan has joined hands with Hombale Films for an upcoming pan-India project. The makers shared the announcement on social media.

Mirai teaser out: Manchu Manoj, Teja Sajja's fantasy film eyes September releaseDirected by Karthik Ghattamaneni, this fantasy adventure film stars Hanu-Man star Teja Sajja in the lead alongside Manchu Manoj, Shriya Saran, among others, and is scheduled to have a global release in 8 different languages in 2D and 3D formats.

Actors Ashok Saraf, Anant Nag, Shobana and others conferred with Padma awardsPresident Droupadi Murmu presented Padma awards to actors Anant Nag, Ashok Saraf, Shobana Chandrakumar, and musician Ricky Kej among others from the entertainment industry. Singer Sharda Sinha was posthumously honoured with the Padma Vibhushan.

Neil Nitin to play Mukesh, his grandfather and legendary musician, in biopicNeil Nitin Mukesh is set to bring the life of his legendary grandfather, singer Mukesh, to the screen in a heartfelt biopic, which he's co-writing and producing. Gathering material from family stories and rare archives, Neil hopes to portray grandfather Mukesh himself in the biopic.

Jennifer Winget, Karan Singh Grover to reunite after 11 years on KJo's show: ReportActors Jennifer Winget, Karan Singh Grover to reunite after 11 years on Karan Johar's 'The Traitors'. The show will premiere on Prime Video on June 12.

Kamal Haasan welcomes Ali Fazal to South films, calls him important actor for IndiaActor Kamal Haasan welcomed Ali Fazal to the South cinema at the latest 'Thug Life' event. The legendary icon, also called Fazal, an important actor for India.

Dhanush's father warns Good Bad Ugly makers of legal action over use of his songsFilmmaker and writer Kasthuri Raja, at a recent interaction with the media, called out the makers of 'Good Bad Ugly' over unauthorised use of his songs in the film. Earlier, Ilaiyaraaja issued a legal notice to the makers for using his songs without consent.

Actor Amruta Subhash on losing confidence for being rejected over skin colourAmruta Subhash recently opened up on how rejection by a dance teacher over skin tone affected her self-confidence. She revealed how it took her years to get over the insecurity.

Different screen, different climax: Housefull 5 to have multiple twisted endingsIn a first for the audience, 'Housefull 5' is going to feature different climaxes on different screens, providing an unlikely experience everytime you watch it in a theatre.

Alia Bhatt looks regal in white at friend's wedding, grooves with bridesmaidAlia Bhatt looked stunning in a white outfit at a friend's wedding in Spain. One of the viral videos featured her dancing along with other bridesmaids.

Rapper Emiway Bantai receives death threat after Sidhu Moosewala tribute songRapper Emiway Bantai filed a police complaint in Mumbai after receiving a threatening message from a person claiming to be gangster Goldy Brar. The threat came days after he released a tribute to the late singer Sidhu Moosewala.

Priyanka Chopra shares peaceful cloud-gazing moment with daughter Malti MariePriyanka Chopra delighted fans with a heartwarming photo of her and daughter Malti Marie cloud-gazing by the waterfront. She shared the photo on her Instagram Story.

Akshay Kumar pranks Nargis Fakhri at Housefull 5 trailer launch. WatchAkshay Kumar pulled off a prank on co-star Nargis Fakhri at the 'Housefull 5' trailer launch. A video of the hilarious incident has gone viral.

One Piece Season 2's key updates unveiled before Netflix's Tudum eventA new clip has reunited the iconic Straw Hat crew from 'One Piece', teasing some fun crew bonding at a slumber party. Ahead of Netflix's Tudum 2025 event on May 31, fans can also look forward to major updates about 'Wednesday', 'Stranger Things', 'Squid Game', 'Outer Banks', 'Love Is Blind', and more.

Why is Dhanush playing APJ Abdul Kamal in biopic? Director Om Raut reactsFilmmaker Om Raut recently opened up on his decision to cast Dhanush in his upcoming film," Kalam: The Missile Man of India.' The film is a biopic on the eleventh Indian President and aerospace scientist Dr APJ Abdul Kalam.

general news.headline: Hamas's Gaza chief Mohammad Sinwar has been eliminated: NetanyahuMohammad Sinwar had stepped into a senior leadership role in Gaza's south after the death of his brother Yahya Sinwar in October 2024. Yahya had masterminded the October 7, 2023, attacks on Israel.

Said it out of love, let's leave debate to experts: Kamal Haasan on Kannada rowActor Kamal Haasan has addressed the backlash over his Kannada-Tamil remark, clarifying it was spoken out of affection and urging politicians to leave language debates to experts amid strong criticism from Karnataka leaders.

1.5-ft cash stacks, all unexplained: Justice Varma probe calls for impeachmentThe report of the Supreme Court-appointed committee, details of which were accessed by India Today, said the allegations of misconduct against Justice Yashwant Varma were serious enough to seek his impeachment.

Lokpal's clean chit to Madhabi Buch on Hindenburg report-based graft allegationsThe Lokpal concluded that, based on the presented evidence and legal principles, the complaints were devoid of merit and did not establish a cognisable offence or a basis for investigation against her.

Calm down...4th largest economy is not all cheer, but it's not a tragedy eitherWe are still fourth. Not even a podium finish. No medals. A rank which an embarrassed Indian parent would sugarcoat in front of relatives by saying we are in the Top 5 of the class.

Pak's Bholari base hangar hit by India had Saab airborne control aircraft, 4 jetsThe Bholari base is located less than 100 miles from the port city of Karachi, and was one of nearly a dozen air force targets struck by India during Operation Sindoor.

Elon Musk's Starlink India launch details revealed: Leaked plan prices, availability and other detailsElon Musk's satellite internet company Starlink is reportedly preparing to launch its services in India, and new details from NDTV suggest the rollout could happen within the next 12 months.

Hands tied, cuts on body: Family of 3 Indians missing in Iran alleges kidnappingThe Indian mission in Tehran is keeping the families of those missing regularly updated about the efforts being made to trace them.

Rachel Gupta resigns as Miss Grand International 2024. Organisers say no, terminatedRachel Gupta's dream run as Miss Grand International 2024 ended in controversy after the organisation revoked her crown. However, Gupta said she walked away first, and for a good reason.

Amazon Fashion's 'SERVE' Store Offers Convenience, Selection and Value to Gen Z, says Nikhil Sinha, Director, Amazon FashionIndia's first dedicated Gen Z fashion store democratizes style access across the country with 3X customer growth

Power out, lift jammed: Bhopal man panics for child, dies of heart attackA man in Bhopal asked the child to take an elevator to third floor, where the family lives. However, a power outage soon after led to the boy getting stuck inside, which worried the father so much that he had a heart attack and died.

Congress upset with Shashi Tharoor's 'cover fire' to BJP post Op Sindoor: SourcesThe Congress's stated position has been that six surgical strikes were conducted during the UPA regime, but those were never publicised.

Survey says men still flinch at the word 'period'A new survey states that 2 out of 3 menstruators say that men expect them to hide the physical and mental toll of periods, even in close relationships.

For Tej Pratap, Lalu Yadav and family have drawn a line in the sandTej Pratap's 'relationship reveal' on Saturday triggered a fracture in the Lalu Yadav family. Tej Pratap, born to RJD chief Lalu Yadav and Rabri Devi after the couple had six daughters, now finds himself exiled from the party and from the family.

Only Justice Verma's family could access room where cash found: Key probe findingsJustice Verma came under intense scrutiny in March after a huge stash of unaccounted cash was found at his residence, a fact "undeniably established" in the committee's report, details of which India Today TV accessed.

Video: Kanpur man bites off society secretary's nose over parking disputeAfter a case was registered against him, the accused officer, Kshitij Mishra, was hospitalised while the victim, RS Yadav, was advised to undergo surgery in Delhi.

Why the world's ultra-rich are looking for a Monaco addressMore and more of the world's richest people are looking to move to Monaco or at least have an address there. But why is this tiny country, smaller than many cities, drawing so much interest from the ultra-rich?

Pak Army has a big war to fight as Imran Khan blows bugleThe Pakistani Army will soon have a more pressing issue to deal with at its home front. Former Prime Minister and Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) chief, Imran Khan, has called upon his party to gear up for a large-scale national agitation against the current hybrid regime of PM Shehbaz Sharif and Army Chief Asim Munir.

Why Yunus' election-by-June plan is raising suspicion and fearsThe insistence of Muhammad Yunus, the head of Bangladesh's interim government, to hold elections by June 2026 has triggered a row, with the BNP rejecting the timeline as suspicious and impractical. The first half of the calendar doesn't leave scope for polls, with people believing that elections, if not conducted by December, might get pushed to next winter.

Wife went for climate project, I visited once: Gaurav Gogoi on Pak link claimA fresh war of words erupted between Congress MP Gaurav Gogoi and Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma on Wednesday over. Gogoi slammed Sarma over Pakistan link allegations against him and his wife, calling it the BJP leader's "old habit of deceiving people".

Sperm donor with cancer gene leads to 10 child cancer cases in EuropeA sperm donor in Europe unknowingly passed a rare cancer-linked gene mutation to dozens of children. This has raised urgent concerns about genetic screening and sperm donation regulations across countries.

Day 4 Live: Carlos Alcaraz into Round 3, injured Casper Ruud stunnedFrench Open 2025 Day 4 Live Score: Former finalist Casper Ruud has been knocked out in the second round by Portugal's No. 1 Nuno Borges. Carlos Alcaraz has bounced back after dropping the second set to Marozsan of Hungary. Earlier in the day, Jasmine Paolini, Qinwen Zheng and Lorenzo Musetti progressed to the third round with easy wins on Wednesday.

Need more plumbers, not LGBTQ graduates: White House doubles down on HarvardThe remarks by White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt come as the Donald Trump administration plans to cancel federal contracts with Harvard worth $100 million.

Delhi to be hit by thunderstorms, 70 kmph winds over next three daysThe most intense weather is expected on Thursday, May 30, when wind speeds in Delhi may temporarily surge to 70 kmph during thundersqualls.

sports.headline: Injured Casper Ruud gets knocked out in 2nd round shock by Nuno BorgesAn injured Casper Ruud was knocked out in the second round of the French Open by Nuno Borges, who created history on Wednesday, May 28. Ruud suffered an injury in the second set as Borges completed a comeback win in the end.

Shubman Gill is one of best India has produced in all 3 formats: Abhishek SharmaAbhishek Sharma heaped praise on new India Test team captain Shubman Gill and hailed him as one of the best players produced by the country in all three formats of the game. Gill was appointed as the successor to Rohit Sharma.

Suhail Ahmad Bhat gets first India call-up for Thailand friendlyIndian football team head coach Manolo Marquez announced the squad for the international friendly against Thailand on Wednesday. Suhail Ahmad Bhat has earned his maiden India senior team call-up.

Medal rush for India as mixed relay team wins Gold, Tejaswin bags decathlon silverAsian Athetlics Championships 2025: Santhosh Kumar Tamilarasan, Rupal Chaudhary, Vishal Thennarasu Kayalvizhi and Subha Venkatesan helped India defend their 4x400m mixed relay gold medal. Praveen Chitravel won silver in high jump while Tejashwin Shankar battled hard over two days to win silver in decathlon in Gumi, South Korea.

Musetti eases past Galan, Zheng beats Arango, Paolini reaches 3rd roundLorenzo Musetti, Zheng Qinwen, and Jasmine Paolini all secured commanding victories on Wednesday to advance to the third round of the French Open, as intermittent rain and tricky opponents failed to derail their Parisian campaigns.

IPL 2025: R Ashwin slams Rishabh Pant for Digvesh Rathi run-out controversyR Ashwin slammed LSG captain Rishabh Pant for withdrawing Digvesh Rathi's appeal to run out Jitesh Sharma at the non-striker's end during the game against RCB. Pant withdrew the appeal after Jitesh was adjudged not out by the third umpire.

MP Raghav Chadha meets and greets PBKS squad ahead of Qualifier 1AAP MP Raghav Chadha met the PBKS team ahead of their IPL 2025 Qualifier 1 clash against RCB, applauding their league-topping performance and boosting morale with symbolic honours and best wishes for the Qualifier 1 match.

Harry Brook's captaincy era begins as England name playing XI for 1st ODI vs WIEngland have named their XI for the opening match of the three-match ODI series against the West Indies, with Harry Brook set to lead the side for the first time as the new white-ball captain.

List of unavailable players in playoffs and their replacementsIPL 2025: The four teams in the playoffs, RCB, MI, PBKS and GT have had to shuffle their squads after quite a few of their players missed out due to national duties.

Jose Mourinho backs Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim with personal exampleJose Mourinho backed Ruben Amorim for success at Manchester United and gave a personal example as a motivating message for the fellow Portuguese tactician. Amorim has endured a rough six months at Manchester United so far.

Day 4 Live: Carlos Alcaraz stutters, Casper Ruud stunned in 2nd roundFrench Open 2025 Day 4 Live Score: Former finalist Casper Ruud has been knocked out in the second round by Portugal's No. 1 Nuno Borges. Carlos Alcaraz has bounced back after dropping the second set to Marozsan of Hungary. Earlier in the day, Jasmine Paolini, Qinwen Zheng and Lorenzo Musetti progressed to the third round with easy wins on Wednesday.

MP Raghav Chadha meets and greets PBKS squad ahead of Qualifier 1AAP MP Raghav Chadha met the PBKS team ahead of their IPL 2025 Qualifier 1 clash against RCB, applauding their league-topping performance and boosting morale with symbolic honours and best wishes for the Qualifier 1 match.

Harry Brook's captaincy era begins as England name playing XI for 1st ODI vs WIEngland have named their XI for the opening match of the three-match ODI series against the West Indies, with Harry Brook set to lead the side for the first time as the new white-ball captain.

List of unavailable players in playoffs and their replacementsIPL 2025: The four teams in the playoffs, RCB, MI, PBKS and GT have had to shuffle their squads after quite a few of their players missed out due to national duties.

Jose Mourinho backs Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim with personal exampleJose Mourinho backed Ruben Amorim for success at Manchester United and gave a personal example as a motivating message for the fellow Portuguese tactician. Amorim has endured a rough six months at Manchester United so far.

Day 4 Live: Carlos Alcaraz stutters, Casper Ruud stunned in 2nd roundFrench Open 2025 Day 4 Live Score: Former finalist Casper Ruud has been knocked out in the second round by Portugal's No. 1 Nuno Borges. Carlos Alcaraz has bounced back after dropping the second set to Marozsan of Hungary. Earlier in the day, Jasmine Paolini, Qinwen Zheng and Lorenzo Musetti progressed to the third round with easy wins on Wednesday.

Rohit, Kohli may have felt they can't drive Tests as before: ShardulShardul Thakur feels that Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma may have retired from Test cricket, knowing that they may not be able to contribute or drive the format as before. Kohli and Rohit retired just ahead of the England tour.

Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez unveil new Uruguayan club Deportivo LSMArgentine football icon Lionel Messi and his long-time former FC Barcelona and Inter Miami teammate Luis Suarez have announced the formation of their new club Deportivo LSM, which will compete in the Uruguayan fourth-tier football league.

AIFF puts I-League relegation on hold amid Delhi FC, SC Bengaluru protestsThe AIFF's decision to pause I-League relegation amid legal challenges by Delhi FC and SC Bengaluru marks another flashpoint in a season already clouded by disputes, raising deeper concerns about governance in Indian football.

England vs West Indies ODI series: Squads, all you need to knowENG vs WI: Harry Brook's England and Shai Hope's West Indies will face each other in three ODIs to be played at Edgbaston, Sophia Gardens and Kennington Oval.

Satwik-Chirag win on return, Lakshya Sen retires hurt at Singapore OpenSatwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty marked a winning return at the Singapore Open Super 750, even as Lakshya Sen's campaign ended in heartbreak after an injury forced him to retire mid-match.

Point of the year? Corentin Moutet pulls miraculous effort in first roundFrench Open 2025: Corentin Moutet displayed remarkable grit and determination to earn a crucial break point against Clement Tabur in their first-round clash on Tuesday at Court Simonne-Mathieu.

Jitesh Sharma was spectacular: RCB's Mayank Agarwal after 228 chase vs LSGRCB's Mayank Agarwal lauded Jitesh Sharma's unbeaten 85, calling it pivotal in their record 228-run chase against LSG that sealed their place in Qualifier 1 — RCB's highest-ever successful chase in IPL history.

Can Mumbai Indians, Gujarat Titans win the title? Here's what history suggestsIPL 2025: Royal Challengers Bengaluru, Mumbai Indians, Gujarat Titans and Punjab Kings have qualified for the playoffs, but which teams have a better chance of lifting the title?

Satwik-Chirag win on return, Lakshya Sen retires hurt at Singapore OpenSatwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty marked a winning return at the Singapore Open Super 750, even as Lakshya Sen's campaign ended in heartbreak after an injury forced him to retire mid-match.

Point of the year? Corentin Moutet pulls miraculous effort in first roundFrench Open 2025: Corentin Moutet displayed remarkable grit and determination to earn a crucial break point against Clement Tabur in their first-round clash on Tuesday at Court Simonne-Mathieu.

Jitesh Sharma was spectacular: RCB's Mayank Agarwal after 228 chase vs LSGRCB's Mayank Agarwal lauded Jitesh Sharma's unbeaten 85, calling it pivotal in their record 228-run chase against LSG that sealed their place in Qualifier 1 — RCB's highest-ever successful chase in IPL history.

Can Mumbai Indians, Gujarat Titans win the title? Here's what history suggestsIPL 2025: Royal Challengers Bengaluru, Mumbai Indians, Gujarat Titans and Punjab Kings have qualified for the playoffs, but which teams have a better chance of lifting the title?

LSG's Rishabh Pant handed big fine for slow over-rate vs RCBRishabh Pant has been slapped with a Rs 30 lakh fine after Lucknow Super Giants committed their third slow over-rate offence in IPL 2025, with teammates also facing financial penalties post their clash with RCB.

Virat Kohli–Phil Salt's powerplay gave RCB belief: Mayank Agarwal after LSG winIPL 202: Mayank Agarwal credited Virat Kohli and Phil Salt's explosive powerplay start for setting the tone in RCB's record-breaking chase, saying it gave the team belief and freedom to play fearlessly in a high-pressure match.

French Open Day 4: Swiatek, Sabalenka, Alcaraz set for second roundFrench Open 2025: Iga Swiatek, Aryna Sabalenka, Carlos Alcaraz will be looking to secure a berth in the third round at Roland Garros when they play their respective second-round matches on Wednesday.

LSG had a decent season given injuries to our main bowlers: Zaheer KhanIPL 2025, LSG vs RCB: Mentor Zaheer Khan said that the Lucknow Super Giants tried to regroup themselves in the tournament after injury concerns to quite a few of their main bowlers. On Tuesday, LSG finished their campaign with a six-wicket loss to the Royal Challengers Bengaluru.

Rishabh Pant's ability and calibre were never in doubt: Zaheer KhanIPL 2025, LSG vs RCB: Zaheer Khan said that the IPL season was a learning experience for Rishabh Pant, who scored a 54-ball century on Tuesday against the Royal Challengers Bengaluru.

Arjun Erigaisi hands D Gukesh second straight defeat at Norway ChessArjun Erigaisi continued his stellar run at the 2025 Norway Chess tournament, handing D Gukesh a second consecutive defeat and firmly establishing himself as a serious contender in one of the year's toughest fields.

Virat Kohli genius par excellence: Dinesh Karthik praises RCB chase masterIPL 2025: Virat Kohli's composed 54 and Jitesh Sharma's explosive and unbeaten 85 powered RCB past LSG into Qualifier 1, reviving title hopes and ending a nine-year wait with their record seventh consecutive away win.

Method behind Jitesh madness: Dinesh Karthik reveals how RCB finisher was mouldedAfter Jitesh Sharma produced a career-best 85* against LSG, Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batting coach Dinesh Karthik revealed how the wicketkeeper transformed into a calm finisher through dedicated work in the offseason.

Rishabh Pant plans short break to recharge before England seriesAfter LSG's loss to RCB, Rishabh Pant said he plans to "switch off" for a few days before departing for the Test tour of England, to be in a "good frame of mind."

RCB ain't RCB-ing in IPL 2025. Season 18 could finally be theirsIPL 2025: After nine years, RCB have secured a spot in the top two. Jitesh Sharma's magical 85 off 33 in Lucknow on Monday helped them avoid familiar heartbreak and enter the playoffs with a cushion. Looking well-oiled and confident, the former finalists seem poised to finally end their elusive wait for the title.

Gael Monfils scripts history with heroic comeback in first roundFrench Open 2025: Gael Monfils became the oldest player in the Open Era to win a match at Roland Garros after beating Bolivia's Hugo Dellien 4–6, 3–6, 6–1, 7–6 (4), 6–1 on Tuesday.

RCB's stunning record, Kohli's 9k: All stats from IPL 2025's last league gameRoyal Challengers Bengaluru stunned Lucknow Super Giants by chasing 228 runs in 18.4 overs at Ekana Stadium. This historic win secured RCB's second place and a Qualifier 1 spot.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
